thread.title: Armed deputy at Florida school resigns after failing to engage shooter

title: Armed deputy at Florida school resigns after failing to engage shooter
text:
Armed deputy at Florida school resigns after failing to engage shooter 1:42pm GMT - 01:21 
The armed deputy assigned to the campus of a Florida high school during a deadly shooting last week stayed outside the building during the attack and failed to engage the shooter, the county sheriff said on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
